page.title: 17RECREATION(1).CALCOT,READING
page.content: Leisure activities are beginning to play a more prominant part in peoples lives though it is difficult to generalise.Many people spend a great deal of their time in front of their television sets. However,it does seem that for an increasing number of people,they want to participate in more energetic activities.Many people today,both young and old put on their tracksuits and go 'jogging'.Many go running in groups,thus making it a social occasion as well. All forms of sport,both watching and playing,are enjoyed by all age groups.Having the Meadway Sports Centre and Central Swimming Baths so close means that local people do not have far to go to enjoy superb facilities.
